Great control. I've used it to display dialogs, charts and whatnot.

But here's a question: how can I change the order of the covers? I'd like to add 'move page left'/'...right' functionality.

This is probably one of those 'be prepared to slap yourself of the forehead' -things but I can't figure this out by myself.

Thanks already in advance for any ideas.
